snippet: James Conner ran for 214 yards and a touchdown to lead Pittsburgh to a 30-20 victory at Boston College in the first Atlantic Coast Conference matchup between the teams.
lead_paragraph: James Conner ran for 214 yards and a touchdown to lead Pittsburgh to a 30-20 victory at Boston College in the first Atlantic Coast Conference matchup between the teams.

headline.main: Pitt Rushes Its Way to Another Win
headline.print_headline: Pitt Rushes Its Way to Another Win
